attributes.action: stop civil servants rejecting petitions to the prime minister
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is not democracy when the civil sevice decides which petitions are acceptable.......who do these folk think they are ....the chinese used to castrate their civil servants what a good idea......we should do it here

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
